oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Wifes Parents. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-32. 8843-8845). The way in which sons-in-law speak to their parents-in-law. 1) p.8842v: |han=kass'o observed this himself, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-32.
